description:
SDN and NFV are todayâ€™s hottest topic in the Telecom and IT industry as they present one of biggest revolution wave in networking.

Communication Service Providers and Vendors are investing allot of resources going in that direction and for good reasons. It is clear that many opportunities will be created during the development and market implementation of such disruptive technologies.

Going into NFV and SDN requires to let go our old mindset and embrace new one. This course will help you to start the journey with the needed knowledge, starting with high level business review and then zooming to technical details per technology, without losing the big picture.

It is here and it works !

Join me in the biggest Telecom REVOLUTION.
title: The Telecom Revolution enabled by NFV and SDN
